text:
="preserve">Anne Cunningham (born 1 March 1937), known by the British actor Anne Cunningham, was an English actress. She is best known for her role as Elsie Tanner's daughter Linda Cheveski in the British ITV soap opera Coronation Street since the first episode from 1960 up until 1984.
She was born in Leeds, West Yorkshire and raised up in England.
The daughter of a travel agent, she was educated at a private school in South Africa and initially trained as a teacher of speech and drama and worked at a secondary modern school in Kent.
She was at the British Soap Awards from the years before Helen Worth in 2019.
